meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny!

Get ready to revisit the radical days of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater with the latest remastered collection, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2. This blast from the past brings back all the nostalgic feels, but with a fresh coat of paint and some new tricks up its sleeve.

First off, let's give it up to Vicarious Visions for not phoning it in this time around. They've managed to capture the essence of the original games while adding just enough modern flair to keep things interesting. The levels look better than ever, with lovingly recreated environments that'll transport you back to the good old days.

The gameplay is still as smooth and satisfying as ever, with a perfect blend of accessibility and challenge. You can play it safe and focus on grinding out those sweet combos or take risks and attempt some death-defying stunts. Either way, you'll be having a blast (pun intended).

Now, I know what you're thinking: "But [insert critic's name here], why are all these reviewers gushing about how great this game is?" Well, let me tell you - it's because Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 has managed to strike the perfect balance between nostalgia and innovation. It's a true love letter to fans of the series, with plenty of Easter eggs and nods to the original games.

Of course, not everyone will be entirely pleased. Some might bemoan the lack of level goals for every skater (GameSpot), while others might find the load times a tad excessive (Worth Playing). But let's be real - these are just minor quibbles in what is otherwise an excellent package.

All in all, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 is a must-play for fans of the series and newcomers alike. So grab your board and get ready to catch some air (or not, I won't judge). Trust me, you won't be disappointed!
